ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP2 auto-correlation functions (ACF) from the Tromso UHF radar.

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Line Of Sight Velocity
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity (for monostatic radar) or velocity along the Transmit/Receive direction bisector

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Line Of Sight Velocity Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Doppler Frequency Measured
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Doppler Frequency Measured

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter  Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Electron Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Electron Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar  Ion Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Ion Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar  Ion Temperature Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Ion Temperature Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar  Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar  Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar  O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter  O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter  O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar  H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter  H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2 ACF Tromso UHF Radar Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value
